I haven't played this game in a long time, last time was when i was little. Bought the game during the summer sale and i steamrolled the game out in 3 hours. Still like i remember it, awesome and a really good story.

Portal 2 is one of the greatest games I've ever played. I've got here like over 30 hours at the moment But i'll surely have more because This game is great, it has co-op and I want to speedrun this game. I don't really want to spoil anything, and I would love to tell you about the story... The thing is, The story in Portal 2 is so Lovely It would be better to experience it by yourself. But oh boy, trust me It's worth it. All these plot twists are gonna make you scream "OH MY GOD WHAT IS HAPPENING". The graphics are still very good I'd say, the big plus is you don't need a high-end PC tu run it at high settings. The Soundtrack is Amazing. It's really nice and climatic. Gameplay (I mean walking trough Portals) might be a bit confusing at first But you'll get used to it quickly. As I mentioned before, There is a co-op mode so you can play test chambers with your friend. Speaking of test chambers, You'll never get bored of them. Except you have no idea how to solve them ;p I had to watch a walktrough few times. But overall Each test chamber (level) was quite interesting and nice to solve. And that feeling after solving a test chamber you ad problems with... Amazing. The biggest con of this game is its length. Many people say You need 6-10 hours to beat it. Well, It took me about 15 hours to finish the story. the Ending was was a real plot and it was satysfying but I was sad it ended so quickly. BUT, If you get bored by storyline and co-op you can play Community Chambers! Lots of them are Really good and worth playing. 

i don't know what else should I say. I will probably update this review if I remember something interesting and worth mentioning. My Final Rate is 10/10. Despite short storyline We've got co-op and community Chambers, so Portal 2 Might be endless fun. Totally worth playing. One of my favourite games, Right after Team Fortress 2.
One of the must fun puzzle games! Too bad that Lord Gaben can't count to 3, which means no part 3.
Still a great game. I love the twist about half way through but i wont spoil it for you

Un juego muy original y divertido, muy recomendable haber jugado previamente a la primera parte.

eu não esperava tanto desse jogo, porém nos 2 primeiros dias eu já tenho 12 horas jogadas (sendo delas 11 em modo multiplayer com amigo) e absolutamente é o  melhor jogo que eu já joguei dentre vários outros...a cada momento você precisa pensar antes de agir e cada vez de maneiras diferentes...a jogabilidade é perfeita e seus personagens são bem bacanas...os gráficos são bem bonitos e você se prende ao jogo cada vez indo mais e mais longe...sem contar que a diversão é 100% garantida...recomendo muito tanto para single player ou para co-op online!
A great puzzle game single player and even more puzzles with a friend!!
